Package org.smooks.api.resource.config

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigSearch
    Configuration lookup metadata.
    Configurable
    Configurable component.
    Parameter<T>
    ResourceConfig Parameter.
    ProfileTargetingExpression
    Represents a single parsed profile targeting expression.
    ReaderConfigurator
    Reader configurator.
    ResourceConfig
    A configuration for a Smooks resource.
    ResourceConfigChangeListener
    ResourceConfig change listener.
    ResourceConfigFactory
    Constructs a ResourceConfig from its corresponding Element.
    ResourceConfigListFactory
    ResourceConfig Factory.
    ResourceConfigSeq
    An ordered list of ResourceConfig.
    ResourceConfigSortComparator
    Sort Comparator for ResourceConfig Objects based on their "specificity".
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ParameterDecodeException
    Unable to decode smooks-resource parameter value.
